savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
savedMovies.actors: Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Saunders Triplets
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 60 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

savedMovies.title: Harry Potter: Witchcraft Repackaged
savedMovies.plot: What Harry Potter can cause to the young minds of tomorrow...or not?

savedMovies.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
savedMovies.actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Richard Griffiths
savedMovies.awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 11 wins & 39 nominations.
savedMovies.plot: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.
